messages.text:
I found a typo in a formula in math stackexchange, I edited the answer (a `1` should be a `j`), but I get the message

> Edits must be at least 6 characters; is there something else to improve in this post?
:expressionless:

elements.text: I found a typo in a formula in math stackexchange, I edited the answer (a
Edits must be at least 6 characters; is there something else to improve in this post?

messages.text: Yeah that’s annoying, I usually re-word other stuff to make it more clear, add a link, etc. to get the 6 characters

attachments.title: Set highlighter for julia tag to lang-default?
attachments.text: I've noticed that there is no syntax highlighting on block code under the juliag tag in SO. Basically, how do we set a highlighter to be used by default with the julia tag? It seems like the default
attachments.fallback: Meta Stack Overflow: Set highlighter for julia tag to lang-default?
